Title: Revelations
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton, Joe Gayton, Bruce Marshall Romans (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Common, Dominique McElligott
Plot: Durant and Lily travel to Chicago - he, to further discuss the railroad with Senator Crane; she, to meet with her deceased husband's family. The Irishmen from Hell On Wheels prepare to hang Elam. Cullen interferes and helps him escape.
